name: Caesar with Chicken
description: A classic Caesar salad with tender grilled chicken, crispy romaine lettuce, and a creamy parmesan dressing.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a side of roasted vegetables and a lemon butter sauce.

name: Beef Steak
description: Juicy, perfectly seared beef steak served with garlic mashed potatoes and a rich red wine reduction.

name: Vegetable Salad
description: A refreshing mix of fresh vegetables, topped with a light vinaigrette dressing and crunchy croutons.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta carbonara with creamy sauce, crispy pancetta, and a touch of parmesan cheese.
